mendel.fs

Interface FileSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MendelFileSystem

    public interface FileSystem
    Defines the interface for on-disk storage.
    Author:
    ctolooee

    • Method Detail

      • loadBlock

        Block loadBlock(java.lang.String blockPath)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       SerializationException
        Retrieves a Block instance, given its path on disk.
        Parameters:
        blockPath - the physical (on-disk) location of the Block to load.
        Returns:
        Block stored at blockPath.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        SerializationException

      • loadMetadata

        Metadata loadMetadata(java.lang.String blockPath)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             SerializationException
        Retrieves a Metadata instance, given a Block path on disk.
        Parameters:
        blockPath - the physical location of the Block to load metadata from.
        Returns:
        Metadata stored in the Block specified by blockPath.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        SerializationException

      • storeBlock

        java.lang.String storeBlock(Block block)
                            throws FileSystemException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Stores a Block at the specified path on disk.
        Parameters:
        block - the Block instance to persist to disk.
        Returns:
        String representation of the Block path on disk.
        Throws:
        FileSystemException
        java.io.IOException

      • storeMetadata

        void storeMetadata(Metadata metadata,
                 java.lang.String blockPath)
                   throws FileSystemException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Stores a Metadata at the specified location. Metadata can flow to disk at memory capacity or during shutdown.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the Metadata to 'store,' which may just involve updating index structures.
        blockPath - the on-disk path of the Block the Metadata being stored belongs to.
        Throws:
        FileSystemException
        java.io.IOException
